metadata.title: CVE-2018-20651 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference was discovered in elf_link_add_object_symbols inelflink.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), asdistributed in GNU Binutils 2.31.1. This occurs for a crafted ET_DYN withno program headers. A specially crafted ELF file allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service, as demonstrated by ld.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
